basic-plan.title: Basic plan
basic-plan.description: For those seeking simple, automated meal plans and basic progress tracking

pro-plan.title: Pro plan
pro-plan.description: Ideal for fitness enthusiasts wanting more flexibility and in-depth nutrition insights.

premium-plan.title: Premium plan
premium-plan.description: For individuals seeking maximum customization and direct professional support.

weekly-tailored-meal-plans.title: Weekly tailored meal plans
weekly-tailored-meal-plans.description: Get a personalized meal plan each week.

adaptive-meal-plans.title: Adaptive meal plans
adaptive-meal-plans.description: Meal plans evolve based on your data.

batch-cooking-time-saving-recipes.title: Batch cooking time-saving recipes
batch-cooking-time-saving-recipes.description: Save time with batch cooking options.

advanced-progress-tracking.title: Advanced progress tracking
advanced-progress-tracking.description: Detailed reports on diet and fitness.

device-integration.title: Device integration
device-integration.description: Sync your Apple Watch, Garmin, or Fitbit for fitness tracking.

grocery-shopping-list-generation.title: Grocery shopping list generation
grocery-shopping-list-generation.description: Automatically generates a grocery shopping list based on your meal plan.

adaptive-functionality-workday.title: Adaptive functionality workday
adaptive-functionality-workday.description: Adapts your meal plan according to your workday schedule.

goal-setting-meals.title: Goal setting meals
goal-setting-meals.description: Set goals like 'eat more greens' or 'stay under 2000 calories' today.

messages.upgradeToEnjoyFeatures: Upgrade now to continue enjoying premium features!

messages.renewSubscription: Renew your plan to continue enjoying premium features.
messages.incompleteMessage: Your subscription process is incomplete. Please complete your payment to activate your plan and gain access to all features.
messages.icompleteExpiredMessage: Your last payment failed, which resulted in the cancellation of your subscription. Select a new plan to regain access to all features.
messages.pastDueMessage: Your payment is past due. Please update your payment method to avoid service disruption and continue enjoying your subscription.
